alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:00PM EDT until June 17 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Morgan County in north central Georgia... Western Putnam County in central Georgia... Jasper County in central Georgia... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monticello, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Monticello, Shady Dale, Phoenix, Harmony, Godfrey, Warfield, Willard, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Calvin, Hillsboro, McElheneys Crossroads, Stanfordville and Adgateville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
